required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Safety and PK of Multiple Doses of LT3001 Drug Product and Drug-drug Interaction in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of Multiple Doses of LT3001 Drug Product and Drug-Drug Interaction in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This Phase 1 study is planned to establish the clinical safety and pharmacokinetics profile of multiple dose of LT3001 drug product and to investigate drug interactions of LT3001 with potential concomitant medications in healthy subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a two-part study. Part A is double-blind, placebo-controlled, and will examine the safety and PK profiles of multiple doses of LT3001 drug product in healthy subjects. Part B is open-label and will assess the safety and PK of LT3001 when coadministered with aspirin, clopidogrel, apixaban or dabigatran.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Part A: parallel Part B: single group
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of LT3001 administered alone or with Aspirin, Clopidogrel, Apixaban, Dabigatran determined by number and severity of adverse events from the time of dosing up to 16 days post-dose.

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of LT3001 administered alone or with Aspirin, Clopidogrel, Apixaban, Dabigatran determined by coagulation test from baseline up to 16 days post-dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes from baseline in platelet function test
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety of LT3001 administered alone or with Aspirin, Clopidogrel, Apixaban, Dabigatran determined by platelet function from baseline up to 16 days post-dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of LT3001 - Cmax
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of LT3001 and derived PK parameters up to 10 days after a single dose or multiple doses intravenous infusion of LT3001.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of LT3001 - Tmax
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of LT3001 and derived PK parameters up to 10 days after a single dose or multiple doses intravenous infusion of LT3001.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of LT3001 - AUC
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of LT3001 and derived PK parameters up to 10 days after a single dose or multiple doses intravenous infusion of LT3001.

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of Aspirin - Cmax
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of Aspirin and derived PK parameters up to 8 days after multiple doses of Aspirin administered (alone or with LT3001).

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of Aspirin - Tmax

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of Aspirin - AUC

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of Clopidogrel - Cmax
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of Clopidogrel and derived PK parameters up to 10 days after multiple doses of Clopidogrel administered (alone or with LT3001).

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of Clopidogrel - Tmax

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of Clopidogrel - AUC
secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of Clopidogrel and derived PK parameters up to 10 days after multiple doses of Clopidogrel administered (alone or with LT3001).

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma PK parameters of Apixaban - Cmax

secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of Apixaban and derived PK parameters up to 8 days after multiple doses of Apixaban administered (alone or with LT3001).

secondary_outcome.description: Plasma concentrations of Apixaban and derived PK parameters up to 8 days after multiple doses of Apixaban administered (alone or with LT3001).

arm_group.description: Multiple doses of LT3001 administered by intravenous infusion

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subject's body weight is ≥50 kg and BMI is within the range of 18 to 32
- Subject is a healthy volunteer.
- Subject's PT, aPTT, and TT are within the normal laboratory range.
- Subject is a nonsmoker
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subject has a current or recent history of regular alcohol consumption.
- Subjects who are enrolled in Part B and allergic to acetylsalicylic acid, other salicylates, clopidogrel, thienopyridines (eg, ticlopidine, prasugrel), apixaban or dabigatran.
- Part B Cohort 2 only: subjects who are poor metabolizers of clopidogrel (CYP2C19*2/*2, *2/*3, or *3/*3 genotype)
- Subject has a presence or history of coagulation abnormality.
- Subjects need to receive a surgery or clinical procedures associated with high bleeding risk.
- Subject has a history of minor bleeding episodes, eg, epistaxis, rectal bleeding, gingival bleeding.
- Subject has a history of peptic ulcer or gastrointestinal bleeding.
